title: Item and achievement API not updating

comments.author: Mystic.5934
comments.body:
not sure if related, but I was looking for the primordus collection and couldn’t find it, maybe that hasn’t been whitelisted yet either?
edit: nm. I see it now https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements?ids=3098
79406 is the ? item

comments.author: Malediktus.3740
comments.body:
Pat Cavit.9234:

I’m whitelisting things when I remember. Ping me in gitter if it’s been a day or so and I haven’t gotten to it.

Looks like you started and stopped midway

Bloodstone Harvest (2 of 15 items whitelisted)
Bloodstone Sightings (2 of 6 items whitelisted)

need manual unlock

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body: I’m whitelisting things when I remember. Ping me in gitter if it’s been a day or so and I haven’t gotten to it.

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: Lawton is on vacation but should be back soon.

comments.author: Malediktus.3740
comments.body:
Anhim.3156:

Oh you mean the bloodstone harvest achievement; apologies.

Yes, not only those, but some things that should be automatically white listed are missing too.
The last post from Lawton was over a month ago, I am getting worried that he was laid off

comments.body: Oh you mean the bloodstone harvest achievement; apologies.

comments.body: the items from the collections from the update 2 weeks ago are still missing

comments.author: Malediktus.3740
comments.body: The item and achievement API does not seem to be whitelisting new items/achievements currently. Is our Lawton on vacation?
